name: Jazzy Jump
description:
Survival platformer in a dice.

How to play:

  • Collect the coins fast. every 6 coins u collect the dice rolls. well you will get what I mean.

Controls:

  • Gamepad
    • [x] to jump
    • LS - pad move;
  • Keyboard
    • Move: Arrows - WASD__ Gamepad supported
    • Jump: Z, W, Space__  Gamepad supported

I'd recommend windows version as HTML5 was kinda in rush. Scoring is registered in HTML version however, leaderboard can be only seen in windows version. (time out me)
